biotools.summary: ARTS-DB is an online repository of precomputed results of Antibiotic Resistant Target Seeker (ARTS), a rapid genome mining tool for the exploration of antibiotics with interesting and novel targets. ARTS-DB supports two main searching functionalities.

bioschemas.name: ARTS-DB
